Augment.Name: Adamantine
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks adamantine DR, Hardness increases by 10

Augment.Name: Byeshk
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks Byeshk DR, +1 die step on handwraps

Augment.Name: Cold Iron
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks cold iron DR

Augment.Name: Crystal
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks Crystal DR, -10% ASF on shields

Augment.Name: Flametouched Iron
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks good DR

Augment.Name: Silver
Augment.Description: Weapon/shield breaks Silver DR

Augment.Name: Fire I: Combustion
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Combustion 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Fire Spell Power.
Fire Lore +21%: Your Fire spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Fire I: Radiance
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Radiance 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
Radiance Lore +21%: Your Light and Alignment spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Fire I: Devotion
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Combustion 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Fire Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Fire I: Flaming Blast + Overwhelming Incineration
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Flaming Blast and Overwhelming Incineration: No effects

Augment.Name: Fire I: Seeker + Legendary Magma Surge Guard
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Seeker 13: Passive: +13 Enhancement Bonus to Critical Hit Damage and to rolls to confirm a critical hit. (Bonus critical hit damage is applied before weapon multipliers.)

Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heat of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is struck in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, slowing an enemy down and inflicting massive fire damage over time.

Augment.Name: Cold I: Glaciation
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Glaciation 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Cold Spell Power.
Ice Lore +21%: Your Cold spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Cold I: Reconstruction
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Reconstruction 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Repair Spell Power.
Repair Lore +21%: Your Repair spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Cold I: Impulse
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Impulse 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Force and Untyped Spell Power.
Kinetic Lore +21%: Your Force and Untyped spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Augment.Name: Cold I: Cold Blast + Corrosive Salt
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Cold Blast + Corrosive Salt: No effects

Augment.Name: Cold I: Fire Shield (Cold) + Ice Shards Guard
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Fire Shield(Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield(Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield(Hot) from another source, they will nullify each other.
Ice Shards Guard: No effects

Augment.Name: Air I: Magnetism
Augment.Description: Combine T0 item with 50 threads and stabilizing compound.
Augment.EffectDescription: Magnetism 152: +152 Equipment Bonus to Electric Spell Power.
Lightning Lore +21%: Your Lightning spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.

Spell Resistance +38: +38 Enhancement bonus to spell resistance.

Augment.Name: Citrene of Greater Dragonmarks
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to grant +1 Greater Dragonmark charges

Augment.Name: Clearwater Diamond
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to grant 1 Positive Healing ever minute.

Augment.Name: Diamond of the Magi
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to provide a +100 Insight bonus to Maximum Spell Points.

Augment.Name: Sapphire of Good Luck + 1
Augment.Description: A Luck bonus to saves

Augment.Name: Sapphire of Good Luck + 3
Augment.Description: A Luck bonus to saves

Augment.Name: Topaz of Minor Smiting
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to grant +1 Smite Evil charges.

Augment.Name: Adamantine: Mystical 1: Impulse +90, Mystical 2: Kinetic Lore VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains Adamantine DR bypass. If you select Mystical Augments at Tier 1 or 2 You gain: Tier 1: Impulse +90 Tier 2: Kinetic Lore VI

Augment.Name: Byeshk: Mystical 1: Nullification +90, Mystical 2: Void Lore VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains Byeskh DR bypass. If you select Mystical Augments at Tier 1 or 2 You gain: Tier 1: Nullification +90 Tier 2: Void Lore VI

Augment.Name: Cold Iron: Mystical 1: Resonance +90, Mystical 2: Sonic Lore VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains Adamantine DR bypass. If you select Mystical Augments at Tier 1 or 2 You gain: Tier 1: Resonance +90 Tier 2: Sonic Lore VI

Augment.Name: Crystal: Mystical 1: Impulse +90, Mystical 2: Kinetic Lore VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains Crystal DR bypass. If you select Mystical Augments at Tier 1 or 2 You gain: Tier 1: Impulse +90 Tier 2: Kinetic Lore VI

Augment.Name: Flametouched Iron: Mystical 1: Devotion +90, Mystical 2: Healing Lore VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains Good DR bypass. If you select Mystical Augments at Tier 1 or 2 You gain: Tier 1: Devotion +90 Tier 2: Healing Lore VI

Augment.Name: Silver: Mystical 1: Radiance +90, Mystical 2: Radiance Lore VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains Silver DR bypass. If you select Mystical Augments at Tier 1 or 2 You gain: Tier 1: Radiance +90 Tier 2: Radiance Lore VI

Augment.Name: Martial: Shocking Burst, Stunning +10, Heightened Awareness 4
Augment.Description: Shocking Burst: This weapon is sheathed in crackling electricity, and deals 1 to 6 electric damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 electric damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier. Stunning +10 Heightened Awareness 4: This item helps you to quickly read situations with sharpness and clarity, allowing you to predict actions before they occur. You gain a +4 Insight bonus to AC.

Augment.Name: Martial: Acid Burst, Greater Stone Prison, Earthgrab
Augment.Description: Acid Burst: This weapon is sheathed in corrosive acid, and does 1 to 6 acid damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 acid damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier. Greater Stone Prison: This weapon is invested with the power of the earth. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit it will attempt to turn the target to stone, as the Flesh to Stone spell. A successful Fortitude save (DC 33) negates this effect. Earthgrab: This weapon stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.

Augment.Name: Martial: Icy Burst, Freezing Ice, Fire Shield (Cold)
Augment.Description: Icy Burst: This weapon is sheathed in icy cold, and deals 1 to 6 cold damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 cold damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier. Freezing Ice: This Weapon stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice. Fire Shield (Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Hot) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.

Augment.Name: Martial: Flaming Burst, Flaming Blast, Seeker +10
Augment.Description: Flaming Burst: This weapon is sheathed in fire, and deals 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. Critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier. Flaming Blast: A flaming blast weapon is sheathed in fire. Critical hits with this weapon deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier, and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier. Additionally, if you roll a 20 when attacking and confirm the critical hit, the weapon blasts your target, doing 4 to 24 more fire damage. Seeker +10: Provides a +10 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +10 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).

Augment.Name: Mystical: Magnetism +90, Metal Type Effect, Air Guard
Augment.Description: Magnetism +90: Passive: +90 Equipment bonus to Electricity Spell Power. Bonus Effects based on the Material Selected. Air Guard: This Weapon stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the user of this weapon is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Corrosion +90, Metal Type Effect, Earthgrab Guard
Augment.Description: Corrosion +90: Passive: +90 Equipment bonus to Acid Spell Power. Bonus Effects based on the Material Selected. Earthgrab Guard: This item stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Glaciation +90, Metal Type Effect, Freezing Ice Guard
Augment.Description: Glaciation +90: Passive: +90 Equipment bonus to Cold Spell Power. Bonus Effects based on the Material Selected. Freezing Ice Guard: This item stores the pitiless immovable power of the ice deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Combustion +90, Metal Type Effect, Magma Surge Guard
Augment.Description: Combustion +90: Passive: +90 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power. Bonus Effects based on the Material Selected. Magma Surge Guard: This item stores the immeasurable heart of the planet's molten mantle. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, superheated magma occasionally surges to the surface, slowing an enemy down and inflicting massive fire damage over time.

Augment.Name: Martial: Alchemical Dexterity +2, Lighting Strike, Doublestrike 6%
Augment.Description: +2 Alchemical bonus to Dexterity Lightning Strike: This weapon stores the power of a volatile thunderstorm deep within. Occasionally, this dynamic power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with a massive lightning strike. Doublestrike 6%: Passive: 6% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike. (Doublestrike is a chance to score an additional hit with a melee attack.)

Augment.Name: Martial: Alchemical Constitution +2, Acid Blast, Disintegration
Augment.Description: +2 Alchemical bonus to Constitution Acid Blast: An acid blast weapon is sheathed in corrosive acid. Critical hits with this weapon deal an additional 1 to 10 acid damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier, and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier. Additionally, if you roll a 20 when attacking and confirm the critical hit, the weapon blasts your target, doing 4 to 24 more acid damage. Disintegration: This weapon has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies and attempts to disintegrate them.

Augment.Name: Martial: Alchemical Wisdom +2, Crushing Wave, Corrosive Salt
Augment.Description: +2 Alchemical bonus to Wisdom Crushing Wave: This weapon stores the unstoppable force of the ocean's fury deep within. When this weapon is used, this power occasionally comes to the surface, crushing enemies beneath a torrent of frigid water. Corrosive Salt: This weapon stores a caustic, insatiable power deep within. When this weapon is used, this power can come to the surface in the form of a noxious, corrosive salt that dissolves all substances.

Augment.Name: Martial: Alchemical Strength +2, Incineration, Righteous
Augment.Description: +2 Alchemical bonus to Strength Incineration: This weapon stores the power of a raging inferno deep within. Occasionally, this destructive power comes to the surface, devastating enemies with massive fire damage. Righteous: This weapon is imbued with holy power, giving it an additional +2 to attack bonus and damage against any evil creature. This power makes the weapon good-aligned.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Lightning Lore VI, Greater Spark, Metal Type Effect
Augment.Description: Lightning Lore VI: Passive: Your Electricity spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Acid Lore VI, Greater Erosion, Metal Type Effect
Augment.Description: Acid Lore VI: Passive: Acid spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Ice Lore VI, Greater Freeze, Metal Type Effect
Augment.Description: Ice Lore VI: Passive: Cold spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Fire Lore VI, Greater Inferno, Metal Type Effect
Augment.Description: Fire Lore VI: Passive: Fire spells gain a 16% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Augment.Name: Martial: +6 Enhancement Bonus, Electric Storm, Red Augment Slot
Augment.Description: +6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 Enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls. Electric Storm: This weapon is imbued with an electrifying wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 15d6 electric damage. A successful Reflex save (DC 39) reduces this by half.

Augment.Name: Martial: +6 Enhancement Bonus, Acid Torrent, Red Augment Slot
Augment.Description: +6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 Enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls. Acid Torrent: This weapon is imbued with a vitriolic wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 15d6 acid damage. A successful Reflex save (DC 39) reduces this by half.

Augment.Name: Martial: +6 Enhancement Bonus, Freezing Gale, Red Augment Slot
Augment.Description: +6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 Enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls. Freezing Gale: This weapon is imbued with a frigid wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this freezing power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 15d6 cold damage. A successful Reflex save (DC 39) reduces this by half.

Augment.Name: Martial: +6 Enhancement Bonus, Fiery Detonation, Red Augment Slot
Augment.Description: +6 Enhancement Bonus: +6 Enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls. Fiery Detonation: This weapon is imbued with a fiery wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this burning power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 15d6 fire damage. A successful Fortitude save (DC 39) reduces this by half.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Efficient Metamagic - Enlarge II, Enchantment Focus +2, Spell Focus Mastery +1
Augment.Description: Efficient Metamagic - Enlarge II: The additional spell point cost for using the Enlarge Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP. Enchantment Focus +2: +2 Equipment bonus to the DC of Enchantment spells. Spell Focus Mastery +1: +1 Equipment bonus to the DC of all spells.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Efficient Metamagic - Empower II, Conjuration Focus +2, Spell Penetration III
Augment.Description: Efficient Metamagic - Empower II: The additional spell point cost for using the Empower Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP. Conjuration Focus +2: +2 Equipment bonus to the DC of Conjuration spells. Spell Penetration III: Passive: +3 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Efficient Metamagic - Extend II, Transmutation Focus +2, Greater Elemental Spell Power
Augment.Description: Efficient Metamagic - Extend II: The additional spell point cost for using the Extend Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP. Transmutation Focus +2: +2 Equipment bonus to the DC of Transmutation spells. Greater Elemental Spell Power: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this items gives you a +100 bonus to your maximum spell points. This stacks with all bonuses except Greater Elemental Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Mystical: Efficient Metamagic - Maximize II, Evocation Focus +2, Arcane Augmentation IX
Augment.Description: Efficient Metamagic - Maximize II: The additional spell point cost for using the Maximize Metamagic feat is reduced by 2 SP. Evocation Focus +2: +2 Equipment bonus to the DC of Evocation spells. Arcane Augmentation IX: Increases the wearer's caster level when casting ninth level or lower sorcerer or wizard spells by two.
